prompt: An illustration of the definition of $W_t^i$ for $i\in [K]$. The value of $W_t^i$ is obtained by summing the i.i.d. Gaussian variables $\xi_{t'}^i$'s on the edges along the path from $W_0^i,$ i.e. summing over all $t'\in \mc S(t) \cup \{t\} \setminus \{0\}$. For example, $W_7^i=$ $ \xi_4^i +\xi_6^i+\xi_7^i$.
